title: Bostitch Office Multi-Mount Manual Pencil Sharpener, Vacuum Mount or Screw Mount, Black (MPS2-BLK)
description: Perfect for home or school use, this fun, stylish, manual Bostitch pencil sharpener provides ultimate 2-in-1 mounting flexibility while delivering reliable, lasting performance. Designed for dependability in shared or personal work spaces, the sharpener boasts multiple features to increase ease of use. For portable usage going from room to room, temporarily mount the sharpener using the vacuum base, or for permanent placement, mount it to a surface using the included screws. For lasting sharpening, the heavy duty steel cutter blade is in a die-cast metal holder for increased cutter durability. The translucent shavings bin ensures you can instantly identify a full bin while its large size can store an impressive quantity and be easily removed for quick waste disposal. For comfort, the handle is an ergonomic Kid Grip handle..
